title: Dedication
text: Dedicate to customers, job assignments, and personal developments.

title: Commitment
text: Commit to pursuing the goals and interests of customers till the final stage.

title: Sincerity
text: Regard customers, colleagues, and partners as family members.

title: Perceptiveness
text: Quickly and accurately capture information to deliver the best quality service.

title: Ethic
text: Put work ethical standards on the highest priorities.
